name: Mint (Fresh)
benefits: Fresh mint is a refreshing herb featured in Middle Eastern-inspired dishes like tabbouleh and bean soups. Contains rosmarinic acid, an antioxidant that may help with seasonal allergies. The menthol in mint may aid digestion and provide a cooling sensation. Adds bright, fresh flavor to salads and grain dishes.
